title: Why isn't Surprise Party Illaoi a thing yet?
body:
A long time ago there was a thread that I don't feel like necro-ing, someone had come up with the idea of surprise party illaoi.

Wacky waving inflatable arm flailing tube men for tentacles, a disco ball for an idol, etc etc etc.

Single greatest idea I think i've ever seen for a skin -- had like 900+ upvotes.

Where is it?  I don't even play Illaoi AT ALL and I would buy this skin.

replies.body:
Personally I've always wanted a candy Illaoi with a jawbreaker and giant gummy worms.

I'll never get it, but you know. A guy can dream.
Is it actually never? Seems like a legitimately good skin idea and Illaoi's love for the pleasures of life makes her perfect for a sweet skin.
Honestly I'm still holding out for that infected spacesuit black goop one, that thing was calling to my soul.
Yeah that thing was begging for a short story about the horrors of deep space...
BLESS! That skin has so much potential to be cool and expand on what we have for space skins

Same but with this amazingly beautiful monstrosity.

https://i.imgur.com/bSLqjCe.jpg[]

That's fucking creepy though. Like why does he look like some super buff human in the candy world? It makes him look like he's only there to hit his NAMBLA quota or something.

He needs to go the pure candy route and be made of licorice or something, not be a human in a weird costume.

I mean, the Sugar Rush universe is fucked up as is. Ivern is a cannibal, Fiddlesticks murders people, old Lollipoppy, Lulu takes people's souls. Jhin fits right the fuck in on his own if you ask me.

Still, I have no idea if humans can even exist in that universe(its only Yordles and humanoids thus far), let alone candy ones.

I'v been wanting surprise party Evelynn for awhile, i'm tempted to just draw it and hope it becomes a skin someone wants to make like the papercraft skins.
here's an idea I never thought I wanted till I just heard about it now. RITO listen to your employee!! Give him a raise. This. Is. JEENYUSS!!!

>I don't even play Illaoi AT ALL

That's why it's nowhere to be seen. It doesn't matter that you're posting it on the boards. What decides new skins is the champion's popularity. 
Illaoi isn't played enough, and her current skins don't sell well enough, so it's a waste of manpower to make new skins for her when they could make a skin for a champion they know will make money. 

I think a big part of why even the voting event didn't end up making them a lot of money off her Resistance skin is because they decided to remove the aspect of it people actually voted for-- the hands on the tentacles and their metal color.
